revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ZyXEL |model=VMG4380-B10A |revision= |asin=B00PY0ECVO |fcc_date=10/16/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=MitraStar |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=wireless router,analog phone gateway,dsl modem |fcc_id=I88VMG4380B10A |pcb_id=45-402-000630 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM6368 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F1G08U0C-SCB0 |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT5392L |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=xDSL (VDSL2/ADSL2+) AFE;Broadcom;BCM6306;BCM6306KMLG,,;1; |flags=VDSL2, HomePNA 3.1 (coaxial), |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=1234 |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Wireless N VDSL2 4-port Bonding Combo WAN Gateway with HPNA}} :[https://www.zyxel.com/me/en/products_services/Wireless-N-VDSL2-Bonding-Combo-WAN-Gigabit-Gateway-VMG4380-B10A/ Product page] {{â€¢}} [https://www.zyxel.com/me/en/promotions/promotion_20130416_076615_me_en.shtml Support page]
"45-402-000630" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :The default credentials are from the FCC manual.
This device uses a [[Broadcom]] [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Broadband-Carrier-Access/xDSL-CPE-Solutions/BCM6306 ''BCM6306''] ADSL2+/VDSL2 AFE. :This chip accompanies the [[Broadcom]] BCM6368 SoC.. <!-- so it is presumed that this is the device used. -->
The FCC test report says the device uses [[Ralink]] ''RT5392L''.
This is not able to be confirmed due to the HomePNA module :blocking most of the board in the FCC internal photos.
The device is shown as having a single external antenna :(connected via RP-SMA connector) and an internal one.
===Models=== The difference between VMG4380-B10A and VMG4325-B10A is that. :VMG4380-B10A supports HPNA and VMG4325-B10A does not. VMG4380-B10A/VMG4325-B10A supports ADSL/VDSL bonding.
===See also=== *[[ZyXEL VMG4380-B10A]] - ''Wireless N VDSL2 Bonding Combo WAN'' :''Gigabit Gateway with HPNA over POTS'' *[[ZyXEL VMG4325-B10A]] - ''Wireless N VDSL2 Bonding Combo WAN'' :''Gigabit Gateway with USB over POTS'' *[[ZyXEL VMG3925-B10B]] - ''Dual-Band Wireless AC VDSL2 Combo WAN'' :''Gigabit Gateway with USB'' *[[ZyXEL VMG3625-T20A]] - ''Dual-Band Wireless AC Combo WAN'' :''Gigabit Gateway with USB'' *[[ZyXEL P-873HNUP-51B]] - ''802.11n Wireless VDSL2 4-port Gateway'' *[[ZyXEL P-870HN-51b]] - ''802.11n Wireless VDSL2 4-port Gateway''
